tool.name: ProfRep_DB_Reducing
tool.description: Tool to reduce database of reads sequences based on the reads similarity in order to speed up ProfRep analysis

param.name: reads_all
param.label: Choose input file containing all reads sequences

param.name: cls
param.label: Choose hitsort.cls file
param.help: cls file is clutering output of RepeatExplorer containing clusters with belonging reads

param.name: cluster_size
param.label: Enter minimum cluster size to be included in reducing

param.name: identity_th
param.label: Enter reads identity threshold for clustering
